name: Gem Jumble
description:
Solve puzzles by collecting gems!

Each jumble is a unique challenge. Using Move Cards, control the path of your Jumblies, push keys, and unlock doors. Some jumbles even add teleporters and other features. Be sure to pay attention to your surroundings.

Move with WASD or Arrow Keys & Click on Buttons with your mouse!

Reset a jumble by pressing 'R'
